title: Vehicles for Sale on Public Roads
summary: Prohibits parking vehicles on highways or municipal lots for the purpose of displaying them for sale.

title: Vehicle Repairs on Public Property
summary: Prohibits performing vehicle repairs, washing, or greasing on public highways or municipal parking lots, except in emergencies.

title: Parking Near Railways
summary: Prohibits parking within 30 meters before and 15 meters after a railway crossing, as well as within 4 meters of railway tracks.

title: Interference with Other Parked Vehicles
summary: Prohibits parking in a manner that prevents or is likely to prevent the removal of other parked vehicles.

title: General Time Limit for Parking
summary: Restricts parking to no more than 3 hours on highways unless otherwise indicated by signage.

title: Seasonal Parking Restrictions
summary: Prohibits parking on highways between 2 AM and 6 AM from December 1st to April 1st.

title: Parking During Highway Repairs
summary: Prohibits parking on any highway that has been temporarily closed for repairs or construction.

title: Parking Near Public Use Buildings
summary: Prohibits parking within 6 meters of entrances or exits to hotels, theatres, and public halls.
